channel.title: Sketches on RILLA KHALED
channel.description: Recent content in Sketches on RILLA KHALED

item.title: Space Time
item.description: Space time During dinner the other day, our friend Jhave reminded us of the incredible difficulty of trying to retain in mind the idea that time is space. So consider the image a clock of sorts, that renders differently based on what time it is for you. Also, who knew SVGs were so fun?? --

item.title: Remember 1996?
item.description: Remember 1996? i remember when only 8 people in the country made a living off of web design that country was New Zealand; "view source" felt like looking at the internet's undies.

item.title: Only Two
item.description: Fast, cheap, good. This much is true. You can't have three, but you can have two. Other (common) cases no one bothers to mention: one | none.
